EmailTemplate.subject: Apply to be on the NCS Regional Youth Board and become an OFFICAL NCS Ambassador!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.Name},
We are looking for enthusiastic graduates to represent NCS in their local areas. If you want to encourage other young people to sign up to an opportunity of a lifetime come to our NCS Ambassador training events over the next week. We are also looking for the leaders among you to be representatives and work with young people from across South London to help plan a social action project and a celebration event to take place on NCS Action Day!
Because these training sessions are after school we will make sure we have plenty of PIZZA for dinner!
We have also just launched our new website where you will find a full range of opportunities, pictures, blog stories and a range of resources.
Become and NCS Ambassador!
We are looking for enthusiastic graduates to work alongside our fantastic Sales team and champion NCS in your local schools, colleges and youth groups!
You are the very best people to share your positive stories and encourage others to sign up to the once in a lifetime experience.
Like all opportunities on offer by being an OFFICIAL NCS Ambassador with The Challenge you will gain great skills for your CV, UCAS application and will work towards achieving The Challenge Society Bronze Award!
Training is taking place this week so click here to reserve your space!
Apply to be part of the South London Regional Youth Board!
Applications close Wednesday 20th of January!
Come together, represent graduates from across South East and South West London and work to create a fantastic social action project for NCS Action Day on Saturday 5th of March!
By being involved in the Regional Youth Board and delivering a social action project on NCS Action Day you will achieve The Challenge Society Gold Award!
Submit an Application!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Rhiannon at tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge Society team!
